author: nishant0
content:
Hey, does besu expect the transition configuration rpc call after the merge is hit ? One of our users has noted that besu keeps on logging the below
> vert.x-eventloop-thread-3 | WARN  | EngineExchangeTransitionConfiguration | not called in 120 seconds, consensus client may not be connected

author: nishant0
content: Prysm, stops sending the calls once we hit the merge block

author: ajsutton
content: Yes it does. We wound up changing teku to keep calling it because the EL may not have reached the merge even if we have (and it may be reset and start syncing again at some point in the future)

author: nishant0
content: if we dont do this call post-merge, what will besu do ? Or will it just log the above and make its logs a bit more noisy

author: ajsutton
content: Just logs the warning but it shouldn't affect anything else.
